00132 // Description: Method that implements the overload of = operator
00133 // Parameters.: VPPoint2D p (object that has the new value for the
00134 //                         attributes of the class)

00137 VPPoint2D VPPoint2D::operator= (VPPoint2D p) {

00139     y = p.y;

00145 // Description: Method that implements the overload of = operator
00146 // Parameters.: int num (number that will be subtracted)
00147 // Return.....: VPPoint2D (current object)

00149 VPPoint2D VPPoint2D::operator- (int num) {

00151     y = y - num;
00152     return *this;
